net.extemporal
Class EncryptionAlgorithm.ModularExponentiation

java.lang.Object
  net.extemporal.EncryptionAlgorithm
      net.extemporal.EncryptionAlgorithm.ModularExponentiation
Direct Known Subclasses:
EncryptionAlgorithm.ModularMultiplication
Enclosing class:
EncryptionAlgorithm
static class EncryptionAlgorithm.ModularExponentiation
extends EncryptionAlgorithm

See http://people.csail.mit.edu/~rivest/ShamirRivestAdleman-MentalPoker.pdf for details. Encryption involves log(16) = 4 multiplications per word, and computation of decryption key also involves 4 multiplications.

obtainOneTimePad

public void obtainOneTimePad(byte[] pad)
Description copied from class: EncryptionAlgorithm
Generates a symmetric key suitable for symmetric encryption by this algorithm. Uses secure PRNG.

Specified by:
obtainOneTimePad in class EncryptionAlgorithm
Parameters:
pad - generated key is copied here

encryptChar

public int encryptChar(char msgChar,
                       char keyChar,
                       boolean preProcess)
Specified by:
encryptChar in class EncryptionAlgorithm
Parameters:
msgChar - character to encrypt
keyChar - corresponding key character
preProcess - true if this is the first encryption (msgChar might be non-transitively transformed for better security)
Returns:
a int, to be interpreted at [k', m'] where k' (high 16 bits) is the decryption key, m' (low 16 bits) is the cipher character.

decryptChar

public char decryptChar(char cipherChar,
                        char keyChar,
                        boolean postProcess)
Specified by:
decryptChar in class EncryptionAlgorithm
Parameters:
cipherChar - cipher char generated previously by the encryptChar() function
keyChar - key char generated previously by the encryptChar() function
postProcess - true if this is the last decryption (msgChar might have been non-transitively transformed for better security)
Returns:
recovers the original message char passed to encryptChar() previously
